Pancetta rump kevin leberkas capicola salami kielbasa venison porchetta fatback turkey ham hock sirloin hamburger. Pork chop ground round capicola biltong landjaeger andouille. Tenderloin ham hock brisket chicken andouille capicola, cow beef ribs sausage. Flank drumstick ham prosciutto, filet mignon chuck tail landjaeger chicken cow shankle. Sausage brisket pork chop, ham turducken chicken meatloaf filet mignon doner. 

 Chicken leberkas frankfurter shank, jowl ground round spare ribs tri-tip andouille bresaola pastrami brisket ribeye prosciutto. Ground round cow tri-tip doner porchetta ham swine. Frankfurter ribeye shank leberkas, sirloin turducken swine jerky sausage pork loin biltong spare ribs bacon ground round meatloaf.

Mat: Ej mat

Betalning: kort och kontant. DOCK, cash is king!

DET ÄR NÅT SOM ÄR PÅ GÅNG
HAR ALDRIG KÄNT SÅ HÄR FÖRUT
MED HJÄRTSLAGEN I TAKT TILL BASEN
DET E NU I VÅR DET HÄNDER
KOM MÖT UPP MED ALLA VÄNNER
NU ÄR DET FEST I LUND
VI ÄR VÅREN NÄR DET HÄNDER
WHAT DO I FIND IN THE ENTRANCE?
You will be reminded 30 minutes before the event
You are out of range or has not GPS enabled

Hurra för användaren! Hurra för karnevalen! Du hittade vårt lilla gömställe!

Vi är Markus, Filip och Fredrik och det är vi som har skapat denna futurala app :D

Man brukar säga att programmerare är en organism som omvandlar kaffe till mjukvara, men vi behöver inte kaffe eller ersättning! Vi har något större, nämligen den karnevalistiska glädjen! Resultatet av hundratals timmars kodande är inte bara en app, utan en fläskig kunskap inför framtiden. Carpe Futurum!

Officiellt är denna app släppt under en helt annan licens, men vi brukar låtsas lite i smyg att det är Beerware. Gillar du vad du ser? Vi utmanar dig att leta upp oss och dela en karnevöl!

Ledtråd: Markus gillar lila, Filip gillar rosa och Fredrik gillar orange.(
Meatloaf with peppy tomatoglace is served with potato wedges and classical gravy.
Creamy Mac \'n\' cheese. Served with sourish coleslaw.
Creole jambalaya with sausage and chicken.
Wheat barley pilau with grilled vegetables.

Lundakarnevalen invests in the future and launches the new area Foodstock. We open up a world of flowers, bees, music and entertainments. At our new area at the Old Surgeon we welcome you to experience more Karneval and extend the feeling of Karneval. Peace, love and understanding – in a previously intact symbiosis! Treat yourself with some Karneval pranks among our Tältnöjen or win nice and not so nice prices at the Tombola shops. Rest at our open-air restaurant and enjoy our American-inspired menu or find the grill-room and get food as good – but with more grill surface.n
On stage there is entertainment day, evening and night. During lunch we offer a more family oriented entertainment, and during the afternoon and evening we focus fully on music from all corners of the world – reggae, folk, indie, hiphop and a lot more!

As the night continues we will increase the pace working together with some of the biggest names in the deep and tech-house to create the worlds funkiest pre-party. We promise atmosphere and a move that would had made Jimi Hendrix right handed!

Here you waste everything that not give you any karnevalist happiness. Placed at strategic spots around the whole area so you not have to walk to far to get rid of things that could be used for a better purpose. Think about littering as being bad and that Lund should last another 1,000 years.

To enter the Karneval area you will need a single ticket or an entrance ribbon. A single ticket is 60 SEK valid for one entrance. An entrance ribbon is 200 SEK and allows you to visit the Karneval area an unlimited number of times during the three Karneval Days. Single tickets/entrance ribbons are recommended to be purchased in advance as the queues to the Karneval area could be long during the Karneval days. Children who are 6 years old or younger have free admittance to the Karneval area.\n\nEntrance tickets purchased on the Internet have to be picked up at the ticket shops outside the Karneval area at Clemenstorget or Stortorget.
Here you will find programs, souvenirs and other fun stuff making your (maybe vague) Karneval memories even clearer.
This years tåg consists of cool tåg in all its forms, a journey through the time space.\n\nTo know more please purchase the program which is sold in Shoppen at the Karneval area.

There is an infirmary at the premises (see map) with a doctor and nurses who are more than willing to take care of you when you’re injured – just find the place. Furthermore, you can get help from a healthcare team moving around the premises all the time.
The Karneval area has also its own police station (see map). Here you can for instance report a theft or submit lost property, and get almost the same help you get at a regular police station.

It is said that necessity knows no law. Therefore the Karneval is so futural that a number of toilets have been placed around the area. Whereever you are, you will be close to a room in which you can powder your nose. An automatic poo remover.
Are you looking for the snacks of the future? Then you\'ve come to the right place!
With the magnificent University building in the background you will be able to enjoy the sweet tones from phenomenal artists at Stora Scenen. Get ready for unforgettable musical experiences!

Lilla Scenen is the star at the pub area Foodstock. Here you will find a wonderful mix of music, food in various forms and bars where you can socialize, eat, listen to fantastic music and imbibe the Karneval spirit.

The music section ensures that it always flows sweet music from different places at the Karneval area and most of all from Stora Scenen in front of the University building. We take care of all the artists who will perform during the days but also the stages from which they perform.

Tombola is spreading Karneval happiness through the games and competitions that can be found on the premises. We create the most fantastic and wacky game shops through music, lamps, satire and futurism that Liseberg never have seen.
There are 20 Tältnöjen which all contain a short Karneval experience. To learn more about every single Tältnöje, please purchase our program available at Shoppen within the Karneval area.

For you, who want to experience music, spontaneity and intensive laughter our Smånöjen are the perfect alternative! Tickets can be purchased at the Karneval area and the performances are shown as often as possible. Make the most of your spontaneity and allow yourself, for half an hour, to “catch the future” in our Smånöjen.

To enter the Karneval area you need a single ticket or an entrance ribbon. A single ticket is 60 SEK and an entrance ribbon is 200 SEK. An entrance ribbon is valid all three Karneval Days and allow you to visit the Karneval area an unlimited number of times. Single tickets and entrance ribbons are recommended to be purchased in advance as the queues to the Karneval area could be long during the Karneval Days. Children who are 6 years old or younger have free admittance to the Karneval area. Entrance tickets purchased on the Internet have to be picked up in the ticket shops outside the Karneval area at Clemenstorget or Stortorget.
CHICKEN FILLET WITH POTATO SALAD, THYME, LEMON OIL AND MANGO DRESSING
CHANTERELLES AND PIE FROM VÄSTERBOTTEN WITH LETTUCE AND RHODE ISLAND DRESSING
CREAMY SALMON MIX WITH FRENCH POTATO SALAD

A wise person once said: "Why walk through life when you can dance?" An excellent motto that Lundakarnevalen has adopted and will comply – amply! During the three Karneval nights in May Lundakarnevalen will flaunt the biggest nightclub in Sweden, Dansen, at the AF-Castle. During these nights the AF-Castle will, without comparison, be transformed into a rumbling inferno of dance. Together more than 6,000 persons will dance through the nights at Dansens four different dancing floors at Tegnérs, Stora Salen and Festvåningen, listening to our fantastic DJs and artists.

In Athen in the AF-Castle you will find the time machine which will take you on a culinary journey that no doubt will spice your Karneval experience. During the days it will be the starting point in the Roaring Fifties and offers you the feeling, the mood and food at an American diner, and towards the evening we dress up. Then we bend time and room and continue the time journey that lands in a bar in the true spirit of the well-known Studio 54.\n\nServes: Alcohol

Years went and the polar ice melted. Scania was flooded and only the tower of the cathedral could be seen. The people shouted for well-prepared food and one pub answered. Pub Underwater can be found at the gable of Kungshuset and offers a sea inspired oasis during the Karneval Days. Sit down for a while and enjoy the lovely atmosphere and the troubadours who compliment the pub and give you a genuinely pleasant experience. We offers a manu inspired by the oceans, everything with a French touch.\n\nWelcome to Pub Underwater!

From1957 to 2014 Lajka has been both a dog beloved by the people and an overused Facebook button. This year is the year when Lajka takes a step away from cyberspace and wins the hearts of the Karneval visitors. With a delightful atmosphere and a big open-air pub in the middle of the Karneval chaos Pub Lajka creates your perfect Karneval hang! Join us and have a delicious paella or vegetarian lasagna, quench your thirst with a cool karnevöl at the best spot of the Karneval, opposite Stora Scenen\n\nServes: beer, wine and cider

Lund University is threatened by a hidden enemy with unclear intentions. The young female student Sara, who by pure coincidence is pulled into the dramatic entanglements, happens to be the only one that can protect the University from a violent destruction. But is by pure coincidence that it is she only? While she is forced to get used to her newfound superpowers, we get to know the geeky Filip. In the company of her newfound friend we follow our heroes through hacker attacks, car chasing and finally in the decisive struggle towards the evil in the first Swedish super-hero movie …

Embarrassing Dad Olsson has a pain in his tooth and is afraid of going to the dentist, even when supported by his children Pia, Cissi och Ville. But a futural and clever invention is the start of an incredible adventure.../ nWe will join on a journey in time and mouth, among tartars and taste buds, in which our heroes fight for love and friendship with the mission to help dad’s bad tooth. We meet a mad scientist woman, singing teeth, a friendly tooth goblin and Scania’s own regional Tooth Fairy. So, brush your teeth, don’t forget the dental floss and bring your whole family to Barnevalen. This is something you can’t miss.

In whatever way you twist and turn the history, the world and its inhabitants you clearly see that we watch the fairy tale about the human race’s boundless idiocy. It is almost impressive how adult, responsible people all the time destroy their own reality. As a child we are exposed to enormous expectations, every new generation are expected to be the first sensible generation. But no, this will never happen. Man is, has always been and will always be (stay), an idiot./n Join us in the Karneval Revyn, ”Cones and Nuts” – 45 minutes with satirical, intellectual and nonsense sketches and action-packed song- and dance performances about all or nothing. A generation’s journey in which we prove every cone (=living soul), without exception, grows up to be a nut (=blockhead).

The Karneval show 2014 invites you to The Light and the Lantern – a Day in Life. In the small pub, the Light and the Lantern, we will experience a day together with the innkeeper Rolle Rosén, who has seen and heard just about everything. From a viewers point of view we will meet visitors, customers and friends, who are all searching for a meaning. With the help of humor, singing and dancing we get closer to people, who all are carrying something around, but who not always knows about it, and constantly on the look out for something bigger. Together with a well-cooked pub menu we can promise a holistic experience that will not leave anyone indifferent.

On stage of Stora Salen in the AF-Castle you will face the Karneval Spex ’Atlantis’. In this performance you are invited to a traditional Spex from Lund, where the fairy tale about what happened to Atlantis is told with high-class humor, singing and dancing.\n The performance starts in a worn and run down Atlantis. The city is too heavy and is for sure sinking both down into the water and to destruction. The inhabitants in the city have got used to the decay, but the city mayoress has decided to get the city afloat again (both figuratively and literally!). Atlantis will return to its former days of glory – and make it snappy.

At Tegnérsplatsen, precisely south of the AF-Castle you will find Lundakarnevalens oldest and most pristine entertainment, namely the Karneval Cirkus. The Cirkus has a long history in mixing student-like humor with travesties of circus acts, as well as genuinely impressive ones.\nThis year the performance, named ”Cirkus 40 minutes”, will take the audience on a breathtaking journey across foreign locations, and offer a fresh mixture of both old and new stuff. A traditional circus is sent out on and under extremely untraditional circumstances because of a mysterious traveler from the future. Prepare for an adventure filled with excitement, humor and grace. A true pleasure for the whole family!

We are positioned in the post-apocalyptical dystopia after the big nuclear war. The world is in ruins, but Cabaret Apocalyptica is doing its best to cheer up the few that are left. It is, however, difficult to know who the guests are when you let the door wide open. A diary from the time before the war could give a perspective and sometimes history becomes very much alive.\nJoin us into a world where the futural not is what we hope it is, where the present is crazy but the experience total.
